title: .Net Developer
description:
What will make you a successful Principal Software Engineer:
   

  

* Extensive knowledge and proven experience as a software developer, with exposure to elements of our back\\-end technology stack including C\\# and .NET Core.
* Experience working with Amazon Web Services, Microservices, API development.
* Knowledge and application of software engineering practices, e.g. Unit testing, TDD, CI/CD, SOLID, BDD, etc.
* Proven ability to analyse, scope, size, design and develop complex features
* Proven ability to work as part of an Agile delivery team.
* Ability to analyse and solve problems.
* Excellent communication and team working skills.
* Lead User Story refinement meetings to ensure stories are understood and decomposed adequately
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to architect, design, document and implement quality solutions
* Work independently and as part of a team with deep focus on hard technical problems and explain the why, how, and what, that makes your solution technically sound, provide constructive feedback regarding best practices, performance, and maintainability
* Stay ahead of the curve with respect to new technologies and techniques with an eye towards continual improvement of both the team’s skill set and the product goals
* To act as technical expert for coding, process and best practices (e.g. adherence to Definition of Done) and effectively communicate this to the team
* Collaborate across teams to improve working practices and skill levels
* To carry out all responsibilities in accordance with the Quality Policy and all applicable procedures
* Contribute to the development and maintenance of all aspects of the applications and services owned by the team.
* The following criteria are desirable, but are not essential since training will be provided for you:
* Continuous delivery, with pipelines implemented in Spinnaker, Kubernetes, Docker
* Experience implementing Data Dog \\- ability to create monitors, alerts and dashboards.
* Experience using GitHub and GitHub Actions
* Behaviour Driven Development (BDD), with Gherkin
* Atlassian Jira, Confluence
* Software security best practices and implementation, e.g. OWASP, PKI, X509 Certificates, TLS
* Software development for regulated environments, e.g. 21CFR Part 11\\.

title: Software Engineer
description:
**About The Company**
 Surescout.in is a leading talent acquisition firm dedicated to connecting exceptional professionals with innovative organizations. Our mission is to facilitate meaningful employment opportunities by bridging the gap between skilled candidates and forward\\-thinking companies across various industries. We pride ourselves on our personalized approach, industry expertise, and commitment to excellence, ensuring that both clients and candidates find the perfect match for their needs. Our extensive network and deep understanding of the market enable us to deliver tailored recruitment solutions that drive growth and success.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are currently seeking a Software Engineer specializing in Backend or Full\\-Stack development at a mid\\-level experience to join our client's dynamic team in Chennai. The ideal candidate will possess a strong foundation in Python programming and experience in designing and implementing RESTful APIs. This role offers the opportunity to work on scalable backend systems, collaborate closely with frontend teams, and contribute to the development of innovative solutions within a fast\\-paced environment. The position involves building robust data models, integrating with various business systems, and supporting dashboard and reporting functionalities, particularly within Restaurant Management Systems (RMS) or Supply Chain platforms.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 The ideal candidate should possess a Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field, or equivalent hands\\-on experience. A minimum of three years of professional experience in backend development is essential. Proficiency in Python is mandatory, along with solid experience working with REST API frameworks such as Flask, FastAPI, or Django. Candidates should have a strong understanding of database schema design, whether SQL or NoSQL, and be familiar with data modeling best practices. Experience with frontend technologies like Vue.js or Angular is highly desirable, as is familiarity with API security, authentication protocols, and data pipeline integrations. Knowledge of cloud deployment environments and CI/CD workflows will be considered advantageous.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 Design, develop, and maintain RESTful APIs using Python frameworks such as Flask, FastAPI, or Django to support scalable and secure backend services. Implement best practices for API security, authentication, and documentation to ensure reliable and maintainable systems. Handle data ingestion and exposure from multiple internal and external sources, including third\\-party systems, databases, and APIs, ensuring data integrity and performance optimization.
   

  

 Design and manage database schemas and models, leveraging SQL or NoSQL technologies, to support efficient data storage and retrieval. Collaborate with product managers and data teams to translate business requirements into effective data structures and backend solutions. Optimize database queries and ensure data consistency, integrity, and performance across various systems.
   

  

 Work closely with frontend engineers using Vue.js or Angular to develop seamless integrations, support dashboard functionalities, and enhance user interfaces. Contribute to the development of backend APIs tailored for analytics, reporting, and operational dashboards, and assist in frontend feature implementation when necessary.
   

  

 Integrate backend services with core business systems related to restaurant operations, inventory management, and supply chain workflows. Understand operational data flows, constraints, and real\\-world use cases to develop solutions that improve efficiency and reliability.
   

  

 Participate in code reviews, testing, and deployment processes, ensuring that systems are production\\-ready and adhere to quality standards. Stay updated with emerging technologies and industry best practices to continuously improve the development lifecycle.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Join a forward\\-thinking organization that values innovation, collaboration, and professional growth. You will have the opportunity to work on impactful projects that directly influence operational efficiencies and customer satisfaction. The role offers competitive compensation packages, flexible work arrangements, and a supportive environment that fosters learning and development. You will also gain exposure to cutting\\-edge technologies, cloud deployment strategies, and scalable architecture design, enhancing your technical expertise and career trajectory.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Surescout.in is an equal opportunity employer committed to fostering an inclusive and diverse workplace. We do not discriminate based on race, gender, age, religion, sexual orientation, disability, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that a diverse team drives innovation and success, and we welcome applicants from all backgrounds to apply and join our mission to connect talented professionals with meaningful opportunities.

title: Embedded Systems Internship in Noida
description:
We are looking for a talented Embedded Systems intern to join our team at Zaptics Research! If you have a passion for MATLAB, ARM Microcontrollers, Circuit Design, C Programming, and Simulink, we want to hear from you. As an intern with us, you will have the opportunity to work on cutting\\-edge projects and gain hands\\-on experience in the field of embedded systems.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Assist in the design and development of embedded systems for our innovative products.
* Collaborate with team members to troubleshoot and debug existing systems.
* Participate in the testing and validation of embedded software and hardware.
* Support the integration of new technologies and components into existing systems.
* Contribute to the documentation and reporting of project progress and results.
* Stay up\\-to\\-date on emerging trends and technologies in the field of embedded systems.
* Take on additional tasks and projects as needed to support the overall goals of the team.


 About Company: Founded by Ather alumni, Zaptics is a research and product development company developing bespoke solutions for energy storage and energy management for stationary and mobility applications.
company_industry: Appliances, Electrical, and Electronics Manufacturing and Higher Education

title: GenAI Developer
description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and innovative Technology Analyst to join our team as a Gen AI Developer. As a key member of our team, you will play a crucial role in designing, developing, and implementing cutting\\-edge AI solutions that drive business growth and excellence. With a focus on general Artificial Intelligence, you will leverage your expertise in LangChain, Python, Gen AI, Agentic AI, Kafka, and Prompt Engineering to develop intelligent systems that can learn, reason, and interact with humans. If you have a passion for AI, a drive to work on cutting edge AI solutions and want to grow your career in this field then we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.
   

  

 Job Responsibilities: \\* Design, develop, and deploy AI models and systems using Python, Gen AI, Agentic AI, and other relevant technologies \\* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to identify business problems and develop AI\\-powered solutions \\* Work with large datasets to train and test AI models, and optimize their performance \\* Apply Prompt Engineering techniques to improve the overall performance of the AI systems \\* Troubleshoot and debug AI systems to ensure optimal performance and reliability \\* Provide technical guidance and expertise to ensure high\\-quality deliverables \\* Collaborate with the cross functional teams \\* Participate in code reviews and contribute to the improvement of the overall code quality
   

  

 Strong proficiency in Python programming language \\* Hands on experience with LangChain, Gen AI, Agentic AI, and Prompt Engineering \\* Excellent problem\\-solving skills, with the ability to analyze complex problems and develop creative solutions \\* Strong communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to collaborate with cross\\-functional teams Preferred Qualifications: \\* Certification in AI or a related field, such as Certified Data Scientist or Certified AI Engineer \\* Experience with other AI frameworks and technologies, such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Keras \\* Familiarity with containerization using Docker and Kubernetes \\* Experience with agile development methodologies and version control systems, such as Git \\* Strong understanding of software design patterns, principles, and best practices \\* Experience with DevOps practices, such as continuous integration and continuous deployment \\* Knowledge of cloud computing platforms, such as Azure / GCP / AWS If you are a motivated and talented AI professional looking to join a dynamic team and make a significant impact, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description:
**About The Hello World**
 Welcome to The Hello World, a pioneering tech\\-enabled co\\-living space dedicated to transforming the way millennials experience quality living. Our innovative approach combines modern technology with community\\-centric living environments to offer hassle\\-free, comfortable, and affordable housing solutions. At The Hello World, we believe that a vibrant community, seamless technology integration, and sustainable practices are the keys to creating an exceptional living experience for our residents. We are committed to fostering an inclusive and collaborative environment where every team member plays a vital role in driving our mission forward.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a detail\\-oriented and proactive Software Quality Assurance (QA) Engineer to join our dynamic team. In this role, you will be responsible for ensuring the quality and functionality of our software products through rigorous testing and process improvements. Your expertise will help us deliver reliable, high\\-performance solutions that meet the needs of our users and align with our company’s standards. The ideal candidate will have a solid background in software testing methodologies, automation, and working within Agile development environments. This position offers an exciting opportunity to contribute to a rapidly growing company at the forefront of the co\\-living industry, ensuring our technological solutions are robust, secure, and user\\-friendly.
   

  

**Qualifications**
 To succeed in this role, candidates should possess a minimum of two years of relevant experience in software quality assurance or related fields. Strong knowledge of QA methodologies, tools, and processes is essential. Candidates must have proven experience in writing comprehensive test plans and cases, along with hands\\-on experience in both white box and black box testing techniques. Proficiency in automated testing tools, scripting, and SQL is required to facilitate effective testing and bug tracking. Familiarity with Agile/Scrum development practices is highly desirable. Additional experience in performance testing, security testing, or related areas will be considered a plus. The ideal candidate should demonstrate excellent communication skills, attention to detail, and the ability to work collaboratively within cross\\-functional teams.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
 As a QA Engineer at The Hello World, your primary responsibilities will include reviewing requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide meaningful feedback and ensure clarity. You will create detailed, comprehensive, and well\\-structured test plans and test cases that cover all aspects of the software. Planning, prioritizing, and coordinating testing activities will be key to maintaining project timelines and quality standards. You will design, develop, and execute automation scripts using open\\-source tools to streamline testing processes and improve efficiency.
   

  

 You will identify, document, and track bugs thoroughly, working closely with developers and product managers to resolve issues promptly. Performing regression testing after bug fixes and updates is essential to ensure the stability of the software. Developing and applying effective testing processes for both new and existing products will help us meet evolving client needs. Monitoring debugging results, investigating non\\-conforming software issues, and training users on implementing solutions will also be part of your role.
   

  

 Additionally, you will track key quality assurance metrics such as defect densities and open defect counts to measure testing effectiveness. Staying up\\-to\\-date with the latest testing tools, strategies, and industry best practices is vital to maintain our competitive edge and deliver high\\-quality products consistently.
   

  

**Benefits**
 At The Hello World, we offer a comprehensive benefits package designed to support our employees’ well\\-being and professional growth. Our benefits include competitive salary packages, health insurance coverage, and paid time off to ensure work\\-life balance. We also provide opportunities for continuous learning and development through training programs and industry certifications. Our collaborative work environment encourages innovation, creativity, and teamwork. Employees are empowered to contribute ideas and play an active role in shaping the future of our company. Additionally, we promote a flexible working culture that values diversity and inclusion, fostering a supportive atmosphere for all team members.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 The Hello World is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based on race, religion, gender, age, sexual orientation, national origin, disability, or any other protected characteristic. Our hiring decisions are based solely on merit, experience, and the qualifications necessary for the role. We believe that a diverse workforce enhances our ability to innovate and serve our community better, and we are dedicated to providing equal employment opportunities to all applicants and employees.

title: Software Developer &#8211; Senior
description:
We are looking for the right people — people who want to innovate, achieve, grow and lead. We attract and retain the best talent by investing in our employees and empowering them to develop themselves and their careers. Experience the challenges, rewards and opportunity of working for one of the world’s largest providers of products and services to the global energy industry.
   

  

**Job Duties**
 The successful candidate will work on innovative technologies as an integral member of the Information Management and Platform Technologies Development team within Halliburton’s Landmark Software \\& Services Product Service Line. The candidate will have the opportunity to work on the latest software technologies in the industry, apply their innovative ideas and create the next generation software products.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities/Accountabilities**
* Design, develop, and maintain enterprise\\-grade applications using Java and J2EE technologies.
* Build and deploy RESTful and SOAP\\-based web services.
* Architect and implement microservices using frameworks like Quarkus.
* Work with relational and NoSQL databases including Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
* Write efficient SQL queries and perform advanced data manipulation, analysis, and reporting.
* Develop and maintain shell scripts for automation across Linux and Windows environments.
* Containerize applications using Docker and orchestrate deployments with Kubernetes.
* Configure and manage build pipelines using Maven and Git\\-based CI/CD tools.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
* Ensure code quality through unit testing, code reviews, and adherence to best practices.


**Qualifications \\& Experience**
**Required Skills and Qualifications:**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related fields
* 6–10 years of professional experience in Java development.
* Strong proficiency in J2EE, including Servlets, JSP, EJB, and JMS.
* Experience with Quarkus or similar microservices frameworks (e.g., Spring Boot).
* Advanced SQL skills, including query optimization, joins, indexing, and stored procedures.
* Solid understanding of database design and performance tuning across Oracle, SQL Server, PostgreSQL, and NoSQL DBs.
* Proficiency in Linux and Windows environments, including shell scripting.
* Hands\\-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes for container orchestration.
* Familiarity with Maven for build automation and Git\\-based CI/CD workflows.
* Experience with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud.
* Familiarity with Helm charts for Kubernetes application packaging and deployment.
* Experience integrating OAuth tools for secure authentication and authorization
* Ability to work independently as a strong individual contributor and mentor junior team members.
* Proven ability to troubleshoot performance issues across application, database, and infrastructure layers.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and a passion for clean, maintainable code.


**Desired Skills And Qualifications**
* Master’s degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or equivalent field is preferrable
* Experience with Apache Kafka for distributed messaging and event\\-driven architecture.
* Exposure to the Oil \\& Gas Upstream domain, including drilling and subsurface workflows.
* Knowledge of API gateways, service mesh, and observability tools.
* Familiarity with Agile/Scrum methodologies.
* Understanding of Machine Learning, Generative AI, and Agentic AI technologies.


**Characteristics:** 
 Proven technical abilities; strong communication, analytical and decision\\-making skills; 8\\+ years of experience.
   

  

**Halliburton is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Employment decisions are made without regard to race, color, religion, disability, genetic information, pregnancy, citizenship, marital status, sex/gender, sexual preference/ orientation, gender identity, age, veteran status, national origin, or any other status protected by law or regulation** 
 .

title: Staff Software Engineer (.Net Full Stack, 7-10 years' experience)
description:
Visa is a world leader in payments technology, facilitating transactions between consumers, merchants, financial institutions and government entities across more than 200 countries and territories, dedicated to uplifting everyone, everywhere by being the best way to pay and be paid.
   

  





 At Visa, you'll have the opportunity to create impact at scale — tackling meaningful challenges, growing your skills and seeing your contributions impact lives around the world. Join Visa and do work that matters — to you, to your community, and to the world.
   

  





 Progress starts with you.
   

  

  

  




**Job Description**

 Authorize.net makes it simple to accept electronic and credit card payments in person, online or over the phone. We’ve been working with merchants and small businesses since 1996\\. As a leading payment gateway, Authorize.net is trusted by more than 445,000 merchants, handling more than 1 billion transactions and USD 149 billion in payments every year.
   

  





 As a Senior Consultant Software Engineer at Authorize.net (a Visa solution), you will be a hands\\-on technical leader and guide the development of new features by translating business problems into technical solutions that resonate with our merchants and partners. You will also drive cross\\-team features that standardize our approach to API \\& User Experience development and data schemas, ensuring consistent implementation of best practices across the team.
   

  





 Beyond features, you will also work on modernization, partnering across multiple teams to upgrade our systems and deliver innovative online payment solutions. This includes containerizing applications, splitting monolithic codebases into microservices, and migrating on\\-premises workloads to AWS and other cloud platforms. You will design and build cloud\\-native architectures using AWS services such as ECS/EKS, Lambda, API Gateway, DynamoDB, S3, CloudWatch, IAM, and more. In addition, you will enable process improvements through robust DevOps practices, incorporating comprehensive release management strategies and optimized CI/CD pipelines.
   

  





 Collaborating with product managers, tech leads, and engineering teams, you will follow technology roadmaps, architecture best practices, communicate status, and mentor engineers in technical approaches. This position requires a solid track record of delivering scalable, reliable, and secure software solutions. While we prefer C\\# expertise, knowledge of other modern programming languages is also welcome.
   

  





 Essential Functions:
   

  




* Drives technical direction for key cross\\-team and cross\\-product development projects (through solution design documents and hands\\-on coding of critical modules).
* Establishes software development standards and best practices by providing real\\-world examples and delivering production\\-ready code.
* Ensures alignment across all relevant project teams, promoting consistent technical principles, patterns, and standardized frameworks.
* Provides leadership in solution design discussions to ensure solutions align with platform principles and overarching standards.
* Mentors and builds world\\-class, high\\-performing engineering and data science teams.
* Applies solution design best practices to increase execution velocity.
* Develops solutions that are inherently secure, robust, scalable, modular, API\\-centric, and global.
* Designs cloud\\-native architectures and drives AWS\\-based modernization initiatives.
* Defines deployment approaches in collaboration with peers across technology areas.
* Optimizes the use of Visa’s platforms and solutions.
* Demonstrates thought leadership through presentations and teaching, supporting broad technical knowledge sharing.
* Contributes to key technology initiatives across Visa and CyberSource.



 This is a hybrid position. Expectation of days in office will be confirmed by your hiring manager.
   

  

  

  




**Qualifications**
* 7–10 years of relevant experience with a Bachelor’s Degree or an Advanced Degree and mastery in one of Frontend or Backend or Full Stack development
* Proficiency in one or more programming languages including C\\#, .NET, JavaScript, CSS, React experience building RESTful APIs
* Familiarity with continuous delivery and DevOps practices, including infrastructure automation, monitoring, logging, auditing, and security
* Understanding of integration patterns, API design, and schema standardization for enterprise systems
* Hands\\-on experience with AWS cloud services
* Designing and deploying cloud\\-native microservices
* Migrating applications from on‑premises to AWS
* Prior exposure to SQL and/or NoSQL data stores (e.g., HBase, Cassandra) is beneficial
* Experience with GenAI tools in the SDLC is a plus
* Experience with merchant data or payment technology is a plus
* Excellent communication skills with a proven ability to mentor and guide engineering teams


**Additional Information**

 Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title: Senior Application Specialist OTC
description:
IMEA (India, Middle East, Africa)
   

  

 India
   

  

 LIXIL INDIA PVT LTD
   

  

 Employee Assignment
   

  

 Fully remote possible
   

  

 Full Time
   

  

 7 December 2025
   

  

**Position Title** 
 : Senior Application Specialist OTC
 **Department** 
 : IT/Digital – OTC
   

  

**Career Path Level:** 
 Senior Reports to: Workstream Leader
   

  

**Position Purpose**
 The Senior Application specialist plays a key role in ensuring the stability, quality, and strategic evolution of IT systems and processes. With significant experience and deep domain knowledge, the Senior Application specialist takes ownership of complex technical or functional areas, mentors less experienced colleagues, and drives solution design and continuous improvement initiatives. This role serves as a bridge between operational execution and architectural thinking, providing leadership within projects and a trusted point of contact for business or technical counterparts.
   

  

**Position Summary:** 
 As a Senior Application specialist, you are a recognized expert in your IT domain. You independently manage and deliver complex initiatives, resolve critical issues, and ensure that solutions align with business needs and IT standards. Your work is both hands\\-on and strategic: balancing delivery with system improvement, business engagement, and peer development. Collaboration across functions, regions, and stakeholder groups is essential to your role.
   

  

**Key Responsibilities**
* Take proactive ownership of complex system areas, developments, or processes with minimal supervision within your area of expertise, cross functionally and together with internal and external stakeholders.
* Serve as subject matter expert in your domain; provide advanced support and solution guidance
* Design, implement, and optimize processes or system changes aligned with strategic goals and based on business objectives, user needs, and regulatory requirements.
* Mentor and support junior and mid\\-level colleagues through structured guidance and coaching.
* Actively contribute to project planning, scoping, and design activities; represent IT in business\\-facing discussions.
* Ensure adherence to industry and system standards, documentation, and compliance requirements.


**General Requirements**
* Master’s degree in System Engineering, Information Technology, or a related field
* Minimum of eight years hands\\-on experience in your field of expertise.
* Proven ability to lead complex initiatives independently, such as large scale projects and drive results.
* Demonstrated leadership in process improvement, problem\\-solving, or technical advancement.
* Strong communication skills in English, both verbal and written; able to clearly convey technical concepts to non\\-technical stakeholders.
* Ability to collaborate effectively in cross\\-functional and international teams.
* Can support and mentor others and contribute to team development and knowledge sharing. Growth Expectations:


 Senior Application specialists are expected to demonstrate influence beyond their immediate team, consistently deliver high\\-quality outcomes, and take initiative in strategic or cross\\-team programs. Growth from Senior to Solution Architect is marked by a shift from deep expertise to broader architectural vision, proactive business engagement, and a leadership role in shaping future IT solutions.

title: Senior SAS Administration
description:
Position Description
   

  

 At CGI, we’re a team of builders. We call our employees members because all who join CGI are building their own company \\- one that has grown to 72,000 professionals located in 40 countries. Founded in 1976, CGI is a leading IT and business process services firm committed to helping clients succeed. We have the global resources, expertise, stability and dedicated professionals needed to achieve. At CGI, we’re a team of builders. We call our employees members because all who join CGI are building their own company \\- one that has grown to 72,000 professionals located in 40 countries. Founded in 1976, CGI is a leading IT and business process services firm committed to helping clients succeed. We have the global resources, expertise, stability and dedicated professionals needed to achieve results for our clients \\- and for our members. Come grow with us. Learn more at www.cgi.com.
   

  

 This is a great opportunity to join a winning team. CGI offers a competitive compensation package with opportunities for growth and professional development. Benefits for full\\-time, permanent members start on the first day of employment and include a paid time\\-off program and profit participation and stock purchase plans. We wish to thank all applicants for their interest and effort in applying for this position, however, only candidates selected for interviews will be contacted. No unsolicited agency referrals please.
   

  

 Job Title: SAS Admin
   

  

 Position: Software Engineer / Senior Software Engineer
   

  

 Experience: 5 \\- 8 Years
   

  

 Category: Software Development/ Engineering
   

  

 Main location: India, Bangalore
   

  

 Position ID: J1225\\-2214
   

  

 Employment Type: Full Time
   

  

 Your future duties and responsibilities
   

  

 SAS 9\\.4 Administration Skill Set
   

  

 This is the classic SAS Administrator role. Mastery here involves understanding the interconnected components of the SAS 9\\.4 platform.
   

  

 Key Tools \\& Concepts:
   

  

* SAS Management Console (SMC): This is your primary tool. You must be an expert in it. Metadata Management: Creating and managing users, groups, roles, and logins. Security: Defining and managing Access Control Templates (ACTs) to secure folders, tables, and other metadata objects. Library Management: Defining SAS librefs for databases, SAS datasets, and other data sources. Server Management: Defining and configuring SAS servers (Workspace, Stored Process, Pooled Workspace).
* SAS Environment Manager: The web\\-based application for monitoring platform health. Monitoring resource usage (CPU, Memory, I/O). Managing services and viewing log files. Defining alerts and notifications.
* Operating System \\& Scripting: Server Management: Starting and stopping all SAS services in the correct order using the provided scripts. Scripting (Bash/Shell, PowerShell): Automating administrative tasks like log cleanup, backups, and monitoring. File System Management: Understanding the SAS directory structure (SAS\\-CONFIG, SAS\\-HOME), managing permissions, and monitoring disk space, especially for SASWORK.
* Troubleshooting: Log Analysis: Knowing where to find and how to interpret logs for the Object Spawner, Web Application Server (e.g., SASServer1\\_1\\), and Workspace Servers. This is a critical skill for debugging user issues.
* Deployment \\& Maintenance: Using the SAS Deployment Manager to apply hotfixes, renew licenses (SETINIT), and add new SAS products. Understanding backup and recovery strategies, especially for the SAS Metadata Server.


 General Skills
   

  

 These are the foundational skills that bridge both platforms.
   

  

* Authentication \\& Security: Deep understanding of how SAS integrates with enterprise identity providers like LDAP or Active Directory. Experience configuring single sign\\-on (SSO) is a major plus.
* Networking: Solid knowledge of ports, firewalls, DNS, load balancers, and HTTPS/TLS. You will constantly be troubleshooting connectivity issues.
* Storage: Understanding of shared file systems (like NFS) is critical, as both platforms rely on it for configuration, user homes, and data access.
* Problem\\-Solving: A systematic, analytical approach to troubleshooting is the most important skill. You need to be able to isolate a problem (Is it the user? The client? The network? The mid\\-tier? The back\\-end?) by effectively using logs and monitoring tools.
* Communication: The ability to clearly communicate with end\\-users (analysts, data scientists), developers, and other IT infrastructure teams.


 For a job application, you should clearly separate your experience on your resume, perhaps with a "SAS 9\\.4 Administration" section and a "SAS Viya 3\\.5 Administration" section, highlighting the specific tools and accomplishments for each.
   

  

**Required Qualifications To Be Successful In This Role**
 skill : SAS admin, SAS Viya 3\\.5
   

  

 Exp : 5 to 8 yrs
   

  

**Together, as owners, let’s turn meaningful insights into action.**
 Life at CGI is rooted in ownership, teamwork, respect and belonging. Here, you’ll reach your full potential because…
   

  

 You are invited to be an owner from day 1 as we work together to bring our Dream to life. That’s why we call ourselves CGI Partners rather than employees. We benefit from our collective success and actively shape our company’s strategy and direction.
   

  

 Your work creates value. You’ll develop innovative solutions and build relationships with teammates and clients while accessing global capabilities to scale your ideas, embrace new opportunities, and benefit from expansive industry and technology expertise.
   

  

 You’ll shape your career by joining a company built to grow and last. You’ll be supported by leaders who care about your health and well\\-being and provide you with opportunities to deepen your skills and broaden your horizons.
   

  

 Come join our team—one of the largest IT and business consulting services firms in the world.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
**About The Company**
 Trzy Innovationz is a forward\\-thinking technology company dedicated to delivering innovative solutions that drive digital transformation for businesses across various industries. With a strong emphasis on research and development, Trzy Innovationz leverages cutting\\-edge technologies to create products and services that enhance operational efficiency, improve customer engagement, and foster sustainable growth. Our company values creativity, collaboration, and excellence, fostering a dynamic work environment where talented professionals can thrive and make a meaningful impact in the tech landscape.
   

  

**About The Role**
 We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Software Engineer to join our dynamic team at Trzy Innovationz. In this role, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and maintaining innovative software solutions that meet the needs of our clients. You will collaborate closely with cross\\-functional teams including product managers, designers, and other developers to deliver high\\-quality applications that are scalable, efficient, and user\\-friendly. The ideal candidate will have a passion for technology, a keen eye for detail, and a commitment to continuous learning and improvement.
   

  

**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
* Proven experience in software development, with a strong portfolio of projects.
* Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, C\\#, or JavaScript.
* Experience with web development frameworks and technologies including React, Angular, or Vue.js.
* Familiarity with database management systems such as MySQL, PostgreSQL, or MongoDB.
* Knowledge of cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus.
* Strong problem\\-solving skills and the ability to work effectively in a team environment.
* Excellent communication skills and a proactive approach to work.


**Responsibilities**
* Design, develop, and implement software solutions based on project requirements.
* Collaborate with cross\\-functional teams to define technical specifications and project goals.
* Write clean, efficient, and well\\-documented code following best practices.
* Conduct code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members.
* Participate in testing and debugging to ensure the quality and functionality of applications.
* Maintain and update existing software applications to improve performance and security.
* Stay current with emerging technologies and industry trends to incorporate innovative approaches.
* Assist in the deployment and integration of software solutions across various platforms.
* Provide technical support and troubleshooting assistance as needed.


**Benefits**
 At Trzy Innovationz, we believe in rewarding our employees with comprehensive benefits that support their professional and personal growth. We offer competitive salary packages, health insurance coverage, and flexible working hours to promote work\\-life balance. Employees have access to ongoing training and development programs, mentorship opportunities, and participation in industry conferences. Our company also provides a collaborative and inclusive work environment, modern office facilities, and various wellness initiatives to ensure our team remains motivated and engaged.
   

  

 Equal Opportunity
   

  

 Trzy Innovationz is an equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fostering an inclusive workplace that celebrates diversity and promotes fairness. We do not discriminate based on race, ethnicity, gender, age, religion, disability, sexual orientation, or any other protected characteristic. We believe that diverse perspectives and backgrounds enrich our company culture and drive innovation. All qualified candidates are encouraged to apply and will receive consideration without regard to any protected status.
